Direct Known Subclasses:
Attribute, AttributeBoolean, AttributeDate, AttributeDateTime, AttributeFile, AttributeHtmlEditor, AttributeLov, AttributeNumber, AttributeNumberLookup, AttributeObjectLookup, AttributeOutput, AttributePassword, AttributeText, AttributeTextArea, AttributeTime, AttributeWordMacro
public class AttributeBase
extends ViewerInputSecurityBase

This component is not usable in the viewers, is the base of all attribute Type Components

Author:
Joï¿½o Carreira

Set the dependences of the component by the objectAttribute property. If this component have dependences when a dependency changes the values are posted to the server. sDependences String[] return by a ValueExpression or a comma spared String containing the objectAttributes

getDependences

public java.lang.String[] getDependences()
Get the current dependencies of the component

Returns:
String[] with objectAttribute values form which this component depends

Parameters:
sIsLov - tru/false or a ValueExpression
